description: An Octagonal temple temple 5 miles south-west of Maidenhead. On a gentle hill in a temenos. Lewis (1966) suggests a chronology from the early 4th CE to the early or mid 5th CE.
bibliography: Martyn, Blick, Brindle, et al, (2015), Weycock Hill (Berkshire), available at: https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449

Cotton, (1957), Weycock Hill, 1953, available at: http://dx.doi.org/10.5284/1000017

(1906), Berkshire, in Victoria County Histories, 1, pg. 216
